TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MonthChangedEventArgs extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 用户单击导航控件以显示下个月或上个月时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when the user clicks the navigation controls to display the next or previous month. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表, 请参见构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 有关处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为 控件中显示的事件指定和编写处理程序, 无论控件是向前还是向后移动一个月。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event that displays in a control whether the control has moved forward or backward one month. [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/CS/calendarvisiblemonthchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/VB/calendarvisiblemonthchangedvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged2/CS/calendarvisiblemonthchanged2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged2/VB/calendarvisiblemonthchanged2vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NewDate As DateTime
public: property DateTime NewDate { DateTime get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个日期，该日期确定 控件中当前显示的月份。

span.span: Gets the date that determines the currently displayed month in the control.

value.span: 一个日期，该日期确定 当前显示的月份。

span.span: The date that determines the month currently displayed by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可获取控件当前显示的月份, 并将当前显示的月份与其他月份进行比较。Use this property to get the month currently displayed by the control and to compare the currently displayed month with another month. 例如, 您可以使用此属性计算特定日期之前或之后的月份数。For example, you can use this property to calculate the number of months until or since a certain date. 此日期通常是当前显示的月份的第一个日期;但是, 可以通过编程方式更改为当月内的任何日期。This date is normally the first date of the currently displayed month; however, it can be programmatically changed to any date within the month. 可以通过编程方式将 属性分配给此属性,以便在用户单击控件的导航控件时重写月份更改。The property can be assigned to this property programmatically to override the month change when the user clicks the navigation controls for the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何比较属性的月份和属性, 以确定控件是向前移动一个月还是向后移动一个月。The following code example demonstrates how to compare the months of the property and the property to determine whether the control moved forward one month or backward one month. [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/CS/calendarvisiblemonthchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/VB/calendarvisiblemonthchangedvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PreviousDate As DateTime
public: property DateTime PreviousDate { DateTime get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个日期，该日期确定 控件中以前显示的月份。

span.span: Gets the date that determines the previously displayed month in the control.

value.span: 一个日期，该日期确定 以前显示的月份。

span.span: The date that determines the month previously displayed by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来确定控件上先前显示的月份。Use this property to determine the previously displayed month on the control. 可以通过 将属性设置为来将控件还原到以前显示的月份。You can restore the control to the previously displayed month by setting the property to . 此日期通常是以前显示的月份的第一个日期;但是, 可以通过编程方式更改为当月内的任何日期。This date is normally the first date of the previously displayed month; however, it can be programmatically changed to any date within the month. 在引发事件之前, 属性会更新到此属性中的日期。The property is updated to the date in this property before the event is raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何比较属性的月份和属性, 以确定控件是向前移动一个月还是向后移动一个月。The following code example demonstrates how to compare the months of the property and the property to determine whether the control moved forward one month or backward one month. [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/CS/calendarvisiblemonthchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/VB/calendarvisiblemonthchangedvb.aspx#1)]
